Gracefully is the word we would use to describe our CORDE CLOCK from Germany, such simple wood-seagrass-metal combination yet so intricate and dignified.

Vintage lines - With its black frame imitating metal and its Roman numerals, our OLDGATE CLOCK is inspired by the classic models of the past century. We also really like the inscriptions on the dial which reinforce its retro side. Its made in England
Our Frenchies MECHANISM CLOCK combines the refinement of contemporary style and the charm of vintage. Its circular structure surrounds
Our Falling Leaves Lamp from Belgium has the Gold color, available material choices is metal and ironwork. It used the socket which typed E27 and have the maximum Usage of 40W.
Our Frechies Parabol Lamp exists with 2 variant of Color: Black & gold. Its totally made of metal. Its plug type is type C and E27 for lamp cap, it's also compatible with low energy bulb.

CONTEMPO console with simple and clean lines is composed of a large oak veneer top underlined by a black steel structure. Placed in an entry or a stay, it will be able to give a note of style to your interior. The italian's Contempo console table is available in BKF with 2 variants of material: solid oak and MDF veneer oak. We provide 1 year warranty for the contempo console table.

Zapata Lamp, an Ameriacan-made lamb has 2 Color varriance, which is Blue and white raw wood. Zapata Lamp is made of steel and glasswoods. Zapata Lamp is compatible with type C plug and E lamp cap, and also with low energy bulb.
Cadzio Coffee Table has 2 Color variances: Sanded Oak, Black. This Belgium coffee table also provides 2 variant of meterial: solid oak and metal.

A sleek and unique centerpiece for a living room, the Dalbergia coffee table features intricately carved bone inlay pattern surrounding the round edge, with a low to the ground profile and circular design. The metal legs add bold flare to its contemporary rustic design. Designed in Belgium.
Timor Armchair, an england armchair has 2 Color variances: Natural black, gold. It is totally made of Solid teck nylon. Made in England
Laora Armchair is an Italy armchair which made of rattan metal and has a natural blue color.

A more than perfect choice in terms of comfort. If you are a fan of comfort, the Sloopy sofa will be one of the best choices on the market today. Designed with comfort in mind, this Sloopy chair includes more "loose" pillows that are meant to hug the occupant's body, giving the cushion more flexibility in support. At the same time, thanks to the high density of the resilient foam designed like a feather, the chair can restore a high aesthetic condition even after being used for a long time, helping it to last for a long time and actually save you more money in the long-time. A more special advantage is that the Sloopy chair is designed with a removable cover, making it easy to remove and clean, making cleaning the sofa never been so easy! Designed in the style of Hamptons, it is usually light and bright with neutral colors. The Sloopy chair evokes a sophisticated yet beachy feel, relaxing and soothing. The Hamptons Sloopy Chair is the American version of the French Baroque, Rococo and Empire interior design styles.

The mid-century inspired Pensive sofa offers both restraint and generosity.
 Ultra-thin arms bookend soft seat and back cushions, and the upholstered parts are underlined gracefully by a handsome wood base.
 Cylindrical legs intersect the plinthlike base to enhance visual interest - a rare detail that demands excellent craftsmanship.

Covered in comfort and coziness, the Hansen sofa is designed to provide a great relaxing experience with deep cushions, wide sofas and multi-layered luxury seat cushions. HANSEN is definitely a sofa that anyone can't resist when lying down. Lightly in structure and flexible in design, you can customize your choice of corner with the right or left corner that is best suited for your living space or habit. Spacious seating with large space to host guests, this sofa can easily fit up to four people.Hansen Sofa Chair designed and manufactured with the purpose of prolonging life. High-end materials used in building a framework that ensure strength and durability will stand the test of time. An additional feature is that the lids are easily detachable and can be completely replaced. You can choose to stay in style, or feel free to choose with our wide range of fabrics and colors. This allows you to create a different look or mood for your home just by replacing your sofa cover.

The Finsbury Park Coverlet is inspired by classic European styling with a rustic twist. Herringbone stitches depict sheaves of wheat for a beautiful natural touch. This design will immediately transform your bedroom space into a space perfect for rest and relaxation as well as a unique style. Set includes quilted coverlet and two shams.

Full of the rich texture and unique patterns of traditional Persian kilims the Mia Kilim Comforter Set is a wonderful way to add bold interest to a bedroom. Beautifully designed and crafted this linen blend set is an effortless way to instantly update your style. Mix and match with similar colors and patterns to create your signature look. Set includes comforter and two pillow shams.

Product: Anahi Grey Embroidered Motif Border Egyptian Cotton Duvet Cover Bedding
Content: We sparingly used embroidery in our Anahi Egyptian Cotton Duvet Cover Set to ensure that tradition and modernity could easily be balanced in the piece. Featuring a solid base with a wrap-around contrasting border, a contemporary design that is elevated with traditional embroidered motifs in a rich golden hue.
Tami armchair has Legs made of Solid teck. Both the seat and backrest are rattan material. We provide 1 year warranty to this special Mexican armchair.
